content.prompt: Which of the following most directly contributed to the development described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The introduction of enslaved Africans in the 1600s into what is now the United States
The election of Andrew Jackson to the presidency and his decision to enforce tariff collections
A series of insurrections and rebellions by enslaved people in the first half of the 1800s
A belief by southern businessmen that the southern economy should focus on the export of select agricultural products

topic.text: 4.13: The Society of the South in the Early Republic

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
